hero.title: AI Image to Video - Transform Your Images with AI
hero.description: Create stunning videos from any image using advanced AI technology. Our AI image to video generator makes it simple, fast, and requires no experience.
hero.introduction: Professional AI Image to Video Generator

logocloud.title: Your favorite companies are our partners

useCases.title: Transform Images into Videos
useCases.subtitle: Perfect for Every Creative Need
useCases.description: Our AI image to video technology empowers creators, marketers, and businesses to bring static images to life with professional video content.

item-1.title: Social Media Content
item-1.description: Create engaging video posts for Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook. Transform your photos into captivating video content that drives higher engagement and reaches more audiences across all social platforms.

item-2.title: Marketing & Advertising
item-2.description: Convert product photos into dynamic marketing videos. Perfect for e-commerce listings, promotional campaigns, and brand storytelling that captures attention and increases conversion rates.

item-3.title: Real Estate Showcases
item-3.description: Bring property photos to life with smooth camera movements and transitions. Create professional real estate videos that help potential buyers visualize spaces and increase property interest.

item-4.title: Educational Content
item-4.description: Transform educational images into engaging video lessons. Perfect for online courses, tutorials, and presentations that need to capture student attention and improve learning outcomes.

item-5.title: Business Presentations
item-5.description: Convert static slides and charts into dynamic presentation videos. Make your business pitches more compelling with animated visuals that keep audiences engaged throughout your presentation.

item-6.title: Creative Projects
item-6.description: Turn artwork, photography, and creative images into stunning video pieces. Perfect for portfolios, art exhibitions, and creative storytelling that showcases your work in motion.

howItWorks.title: Create Videos in 3 Simple Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: No Video Editing Experience Required
howItWorks.description: Our AI image to video generator makes video creation as simple as uploading a photo. Transform any image into professional video content in minutes.

step-1.title: Upload Your Image
step-1.description: Start by uploading any photo in JPG, PNG, or WebP format. Our AI image to video system accepts high-quality images up to 10MB.
details: Support for all common image formats including JPG, PNG, and WebP
High-resolution image processing for professional video quality
Secure upload with automatic image optimization

step-2.title: Describe the Motion
step-2.description: Tell our AI what kind of movement or animation you want. Our advanced AI image to video technology understands natural language descriptions.
details: Automatically generates accurate diagrams with FlowChart AI‚Äôs layout engine
Optimized visual structure for readability and presentation
No need to manually draw‚ÄîFlowChart AI does it all for you

step-3.title: Download Your Video
step-3.description: Make adjustments using FlowChart AI‚Äôs intuitive editor. Save diagrams to your personal workspace, manage your flowcharts, and return to refine or export when needed.
details: Edit using FlowChart AI‚Äôs drag-and-drop canvas‚Äîfast and intuitive
Organize all your diagrams in a personal FlowChart AI workspace
Export in Excalidraw format; PNG, SVG, and PDF exports coming soon

aiCapabilities.title: Advanced AI Image to Video Technology
aiCapabilities.subtitle: Powered by State-of-the-Art AI
aiCapabilities.description: Our AI image to video system uses advanced machine learning models to understand images and generate realistic motion with professional quality results.
aiCapabilities.capability-1: Deep Image Understanding ‚Äì Our AI analyzes every detail of your image to create natural and realistic motion effects
aiCapabilities.capability-2: Smart Motion Synthesis ‚Äì Advanced algorithms generate smooth, professional-quality video animations from static images

aiCapabilities.capability-5: Multiple Format Support ‚Äì Works with JPG, PNG, and WebP images, outputting high-quality MP4 videos ready for use

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: AI-Powered Video Creation
features.description: Our AI image to video platform offers comprehensive features designed to make video creation effortless, intelligent, and professional.

item-1.title: Smart Image Analysis
item-1.description: Upload any image and our AI automatically analyzes the content, depth, and composition to create the most natural motion effects. No technical knowledge required‚Äîjust upload and describe your vision.

item-2.title: Multiple Resolution Options
item-2.description: Choose from 480p, 580p, or 720p output quality based on your needs. Whether for social media, presentations, or professional use, get the perfect resolution every time.

item-3.title: Natural Language Processing
item-3.description: Simply describe the motion you want in plain English. Our AI image to video technology understands complex descriptions and translates them into smooth, realistic animations.

item-4.title: Instant Video Generation
item-4.description: Get professional-quality videos in seconds, not hours. Our optimized AI image to video processing delivers fast results without compromising on quality or detail.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Everything You Need to Know About AI Image to Video

item-1.question: What is AI image to video technology?
item-1.answer: AI image to video is an advanced technology that uses artificial intelligence to transform static images into dynamic videos. Our system analyzes your image and generates realistic motion effects, creating professional-quality videos in seconds.

item-2.question: What image formats are supported?
item-2.answer: Our AI image to video generator supports JPG, PNG, and WebP image formats. Images can be up to 10MB in size, and we automatically optimize them for the best video generation results.

item-3.question: How long does it take to generate a video?
item-3.answer: Our AI image to video generator typically creates videos in 15-30 seconds, depending on the complexity of your image and the motion description. This is significantly faster than traditional video editing methods.

item-4.question: What video resolutions are available?
item-4.answer: Our AI image to video platform offers three resolution options: 480p for fast processing, 580p for balanced quality and speed, and 720p for the highest quality output suitable for professional use.

item-5.question: Can I use the generated videos commercially?
item-5.answer: Yes. All videos created with our AI image to video generator can be used for commercial purposes, including marketing, advertising, social media content, and business presentations.

item-6.question: How do I write effective motion descriptions?
item-6.answer: Use clear, descriptive language to explain the movement you want. For example: 'camera slowly zooms in' or 'gentle left-to-right pan'. Our AI image to video system understands natural language and creates realistic motion accordingly.

item-7.question: What types of images work best?
item-7.answer: Our AI image to video generator works with all types of images - portraits, landscapes, products, artwork, and more. High-resolution images with clear subjects typically produce the best motion effects.

item-8.question: Is there a free version available?
item-8.answer: Yes, we offer a free tier that allows you to try our AI image to video generator. Create your first videos and experience the quality before choosing a paid plan.

item-9.question: How can I upgrade or change my plan?
item-9.answer: You can easily upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan through your account settings. All plan changes take effect immediately with transparent billing.
